blockChannel(address).details: - Can only be called by pushChannelAdmin         - Can only be Called for Activated Channels         - Can only Be Called for NON-BLOCKED Channels         - Updates channel's state to BLOCKED ('3')         - Decreases the Channel Count         - Since there is no refund, the channel's poolContribution is added to PROTOCOL_POOL_FEES and Removed from CHANNEL_POOL_FUNDS         - Emit 'ChannelBlocked' Event

params._channelAddress: Address of the Channel to be blocked

calculateEpochRewards(address,uint256).details: Formulae for reward calculation:         rewards = ( userStakedWeight at Epoch(n) * avalailable rewards at EPOCH(n) ) / totalStakedWeight at EPOCH(n)

claimChatIncentives(uint256).details: Only accessible if a particular user has a non-zero PUSH token earnings in contract.

params._amount: Amount of PUSH tokens to be claimed

params._amountDeposited: - Fees required for setting up channel notification settings
params._notifDescription: - Description of each Notification that depicts the Purpose of that Notification
params._notifOptions: - Total Notification options provided by the Channel Owner

createChannelWithPUSH(uint8,bytes,uint25.details: Only allows users to Create One Channel for a specific address.         Only allows a Valid Channel Type to be assigned for the Channel Being created.         Validates and Transfers the amount of PUSH  from the Channel Creator to the EPNS Core Contract

params._amount: Amount of PUSH  to be deposited before Creating the Channel
params._channelExpiryTime: the expiry time for time bound channels
params._channelType: the type of the Channel Being created
params._identity: the bytes value of the identity of the Channel

daoHarvestPaginated(uint256).details: only accessible by Push Admin         Unlike other harvest functions, this is designed to transfer rewards to Push Governance.

params._tillEpoch: - the end epoch number till which rewards shall be counted.

deactivateChannel().details: - Function can only be Called by Already Activated Channels         - Calculates the totalRefundableAmount for the Channel Owner.         - The function deducts MIN_POOL_CONTRIBUTION from refundAble amount to ensure that channel's weight & poolContribution never becomes ZERO.         - Updates the State of the Channel(channelState) and the New Channel Weight in the Channel's Struct         - In case, the Channel Owner wishes to reactivate his/her channel, they need to Deposit at least the Minimum required PUSH  while reactivating.

destroyTimeBoundChannel(address).details: - Can only be called the owner of the Channel or by the EPNS Governance/Admin.         - EPNS Governance/Admin can only destory a channel after 14 Days of its expriation timestamp.         - Can only be called if the Channel is of type - TimeBound         - Can only be called after the Channel Expiry time is up.         - If Channel Owner destroys the channel after expiration, he/she recieves back refundable amount & CHANNEL_POOL_FUNDS decreases.         - If Channel is destroyed by EPNS Governance/Admin, No refunds for channel owner. Refundable Push tokens are added to PROTOCOL_POOL_FEES.         - Deletes the Channel completely         - It transfers back refundable tokenAmount back to the USER.

getChannelVerfication(address).details: Get if channel is verified or not

params._channel: Address of the channel to be Verified

returns.verificationStatus: Returns 0 for not verified, 1 for primary verification, 2 for secondary verification

handleChatRequestData(address,address,ui.details: This function currently handles the PUSH tokens that enters the contract due to any         activation of incentivizied chat request from Communicator contract.          - Can only be called by Communicator contract          - Records and keeps track of Pool Funds and Pool Fees          - Stores the PUSH tokens for the Celeb User, which can be claimed later only by that specific user.

params.amount: Amount of PUSH tokens deposited for activating the chat request
params.requestReceiver: Address of the target user for whom the request is activated.
params.requestSender: Address that initiates the incentivized chat request

harvestAll().details: Computes nextFromEpoch and currentEpoch and uses them as startEPoch and endEpoch respectively.         Rewards are claculated from start epoch till endEpoch(currentEpoch - 1).         Once calculated, user's total claimed rewards and nextFromEpoch details is updated.

harvestPaginated(uint256).details: _tillEpoch should never be equal to currentEpoch.         Transfers rewards to caller and updates user's details.

params._tillEpoch: - the end epoch number till which rewards shall be counted.

initializeStake().details: Requires caller to deposit/stake 1 PUSH token to ensure staking pool is never zero.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

reactivateChannel(uint256).details: - Function can only be called by previously Deactivated Channels         - Channel Owner must Depost at least minimum amount of PUSH  to reactivate his/her channel.         - Deposited PUSH amount is distributed between CHANNEL_POOL_FUNDS and PROTOCOL_POOL_FEES         - Calculation of the new Channel Weight and poolContribution is performed and stored         - Updates the State of the Channel(channelState) in the Channel's Struct.

params._amount: Amount of PUSH to be deposited

setFeeAmount(uint256).details: _newFees must not be more than (or equal to) the ADD_CHANNEL_MIN_FEES

params._newFees: new minimum fees required for FEE_AMOUNT

setMinChannelCreationFees(uint256).details: Minimum required amount can never be below the sum of MIN_POOL_CONTRIBUTION and FEE_AMOUNT

params._newFees: new minimum fees required for Channel Creation

stake(uint256).details: Records total Amount staked so far by a particular user         Triggers weight adjustents functions

params._amount: represents amount of tokens to be staked

unstake().details: Allows stakers to claim rewards before unstaking their tokens         Triggers weight adjustents functions         Allows users to unstake all amount at once

unverifyChannel(address).details: Channel who verified this channel or Push Channel Admin can only revoke

params._channel: Address of the channel to be unverified

updateChannelMeta(address,bytes,uint256).details: Only accessible when contract is NOT Paused       Only accessible when Caller is the Channel Owner itself       If Channel Owner is updating the Channel Meta for the first time:       Required Fees => 50 PUSH tokens       If Channel Owner is updating the Channel Meta for the N time:       Required Fees => (50 * N) PUSH Tokens       Total fees goes to PROTOCOL_POOL_FEES       Updates the channelUpdateCounter       Updates the channelUpdateBlock       Records the Block Number of the Block at which the Channel is being updated       Emits an event with the new identity for the respective Channel Address

params._amount: amount of PUSH Token required for updating channel details.
params._newIdentity: bytes Value for the New Identity of the Channel

verifyChannel(address).details: Channel will be verified by primary or secondary verification, will fail or upgrade if already verified

params._channel: Address of the channel to be Verified

CHANNEL_POOL_FUNDS().notice: Necessary variables for Keeping track of Funds and Fees

addPoolFees(uint256).notice: Allows caller to add pool_fees at any given epoch

blockChannel(address).notice: ALlows the pushChannelAdmin to Block any particular channel Completely.

calculateEpochRewards(address,uint256).notice: Calculates and returns the claimable reward amount for a user at a given EPOCH ID.

claimChatIncentives(uint256).notice: Allows the Celeb User(for whom chat requests were triggered) to claim their PUSH token earings.

createChannelSettings(uint256,string,str.notice: - Deliminated Notification Settings string contains -> Total Notif Options + Notification Settings For instance: 5+1-0+2-50-20-100+1-1+2-78-10-150  5 -> Total Notification Options provided by a Channel owner  For Boolean Type Notif Options  1-0 -> 1 stands for BOOLEAN type - 0 stands for Default Boolean Type for that Notifcation(set by Channel Owner), In this case FALSE.  1-1 stands for BOOLEAN type - 1 stands for Default Boolean Type for that Notifcation(set by Channel Owner), In this case TRUE.  For SLIDER TYPE Notif Options   2-50-20-100 -> 2 stands for SLIDER TYPE - 50 stands for Default Value for that Option - 20 is the Start Range of that SLIDER - 100 is the END Range of that SLIDER Option  2-78-10-150 -> 2 stands for SLIDER TYPE - 78 stands for Default Value for that Option - 10 is the Start Range of that SLIDER - 150 is the END Range of that SLIDER Option

createChannelWithPUSH(uint8,bytes,uint25.notice: An external function that allows users to Create their Own Channels by depositing a valid amount of PUSH

daoHarvestPaginated(uint256).notice: Allows Push Governance to harvest/claim the earned rewards for its stake in the protocol

deactivateChannel().notice: Allows Channel Owner to Deactivate his/her Channel for any period of Time. Channels Deactivated can be Activated again.

destroyTimeBoundChannel(address).notice: Function that allows Channel Owners to Destroy their Time-Bound Channels

epochRewards(uint256).notice: Stores all the individual epoch rewards

epochToTotalStakedWeight(uint256).notice: Stores the total staked weight at a specific epoch.

getChannelVerfication(address).notice: Function is designed to tell if a channel is verified or not

groupNormalizedWeight().notice: Helper Variables for FSRatio Calculation | GROUPS = CHANNELS -> NOT IN USE

handleChatRequestData(address,address,ui.notice: Designed to handle the incoming Incentivized Chat Request Data and PUSH tokens.

harvestAll().notice: Allows users to harvest/claim their earned rewards from the protocol

harvestPaginated(uint256).notice: Allows paginated harvests for users between a particular number of epochs.

initializeStake().notice: Function to initialize the staking procedure in Core contract

lastEpochRelative(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the epoch ID based on the start and end block numbers passed as input

reactivateChannel(uint256).notice: Allows Channel Owner to Reactivate his/her Channel again.

setFeeAmount(uint256).notice: Allows admin to set the Fee Amount of core contract

setMinChannelCreationFees(uint256).notice: Allows to set the Minimum amount threshold for Creating Channels

stake(uint256).notice: Function to allow users to stake in the protocol

unstake().notice: Function to allow users to Unstake from the protocol

unverifyChannel(address).notice: Function is designed to unverify a channel

updateChannelMeta(address,bytes,uint256).notice: Allows Channel Owner to update their Channel's Details like Description, Name, Logo, etc by passing in a new identity bytes hash

verifyChannel(address).notice: Function is designed to verify a channel

@notice Allows caller to add pool_fees at any given epoch
@notice Function to return User's Push Holder weight based on amount being staked & current block number
@notice Returns the epoch ID based on the start and end block numbers passed as input

@notice Function to initialize the staking procedure in Core contract
 @dev    Requires caller to deposit/stake 1 PUSH token to ensure staking pool is never zero.

@notice  This functions helps in adjustment of user's as well as totalWeigts, both of which are imperative for
 reward calculation at a particular epoch.
 @dev     Enables adjustments of user's stakedWeight, totalStakedWeight, epochToTotalStakedWeight as well as
 epochToTotalStakedWeight.
          triggers _setupEpochsReward() to adjust rewards for every epoch till the current epoch
          Includes 2 main cases of weight adjustments
          1st Case: User stakes for the very first time:
              - Simply update userFeesInfo, totalStakedWeight and epochToTotalStakedWeight of currentEpoch
          2nd Case: User is NOT staking for first time - 2 Subcases
              2.1 Case: User stakes again but in Same Epoch
                  - Increase user's stake and totalStakedWeight
                  - Record the epochToUserStakedWeight for that epoch
                  - Record the epochToTotalStakedWeight of that epoch
              2.2 Case: - User stakes again but in different Epoch
                  - Update the epochs between lastStakedEpoch & (currentEpoch - 1) with the old staked weight
 amounts
                  - While updating epochs between lastStaked & current Epochs, if any epoch has zero value for
 totalStakedWeight, update it with current totalStakedWeight value of the protocol
                  - For currentEpoch, initialize the epoch id with updated weight values for
 epochToUserStakedWeight & epochToTotalStakedWeight
@inheritdoc IPushCoreV2
@inheritdoc IPushCoreV2
